entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thunderstorms this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:56 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
